pr_title: Fix JIT debug info for ARM cross compile builds

timeline.bodyText: Why doesn't this use $(OPENJ9_CC_PREFIX) like above and below?
timeline.author: keithc-ca
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -74,6 +74,7 @@ ifeq ($(PLATFORM),arm-linux-gcc-cross)
     ifeq (default,$(origin AS))
         export AS=$(OPENJ9_CC_PREFIX)-as
     endif
+    export OBJCOPY?=bcm2708hardfp-objcopy

replies.bodyText: This toolchain's objcopy doesn't have the same prefix as the other tools.
replies.author: ymanton

timeline.message:
Fix JIT debug info for ARM cross compile builds

Use the right version of objcopy when cross compiling.

Signed-off-by: Younes Manton <ymanton@ca.ibm.com>

Fix JIT debug info for ARM cross compile builds

Use the right version of objcopy when cross compiling.

Signed-off-by: Younes Manton <ymanton@ca.ibm.com>
